body: Hmm, I read `register_hook` more carefully, and it seems that it not only puts a hook on a variable, it also calls `register_hook_dict` on the `grad_fn`, which is probably what is triggering `counter`. So maybe I just don't understand what the semantics of `register_hooks` is supposed to be...
